org.batfish.z3.expr

Class ReachabilityProgramOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.batfish.z3.expr.ReachabilityProgramOptimizer

  • public class ReachabilityProgramOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Remove states that can't possibly be derived from the origination states. (i.e. if there is no chain of rules from an OriginateVrf to the state)

    Remove states that are irrelevant to the query (i.e. if there is no sequence of rules that leads from them to a query state
